Detailed Description

Interface of APS information base.

Author:
Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com
Support email: avr@atmel.com

Copyright (c) 2008-2011, Atmel Corporation. All rights reserved. Licensed under Atmel's Limited License Agreement (BitCloudTM).

Definition in file apsAIB.h.

Define Documentation

#define APS_AIB_NONMEMBER_RADIUS_DEFAULT_VALUE   2

The APS information base comprises the attributes required to manage the APS layer of a device. The attributes of the AIB are listed in ZigBee spec r19, Table 2.24, page 61. The securityrelated AIB attributes are described in sub-clause 4.4.10, page 489.

Definition at line 38 of file apsAIB.h.

Function Documentation

INLINE bool APS_IsTcAddress ( const ExtAddr_t *  addr)

Check wether supplied address is a Trust Center address.

Parameters:
[in]addr- pointer to required address
Returns:
true, if required address is TC address, false - otherwise
